abstract: Citigroup is hoping to create joint ventures with third parties as a way of shedding businesses it does not want, The New York Post reported, citing high-level Citi insiders.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is hoping to create joint ventures with third parties as a way of shedding businesses it does not want, The New York Post reported, citing high-level Citi insiders.

headline.main: Citi Said to Consider Joint Ventures for Units
